1. Hey there! I'm David, a supportive, nonjudgmental weight-loss coach named. Based on your profile summary, I'd like to go into more detail about my approach to weight loss coaching.

2. As a coach, my mission is to help you achieve your health and wellness goals. I believe that every individual is unique, and their journey to weight loss will be different. That's why I tailor my coaching approach to your specific needs and preferences.

3. I believe that motivation is key when it comes to weight loss. That's why I incorporate various methods, such as cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT), to help you stay motivated. CBT helps you identify and challenge negative thought patterns that may be holding you back from achieving your goals.
